---
title: Template (Org)
description: Full template covering all 6 NIST CSF 2.0 functions at the organisational level
---

This is a fill-in template covering all 6 NIST CSF 2.0 functions at the organisational level. Copy this structure when applying the methodology to your organisation. For guidance on what to put in each section, see the corresponding category page linked at the top of each template page.

| Function | Categories |
|----------|------------|
| [Govern](/docs/templates/complete/govern) | Organizational context, risk strategy, roles, policy, oversight, and supply chain risk |
| [Identify](/docs/templates/complete/identify) | Asset management, risk assessment, and improvement |
| [Protect](/docs/templates/complete/protect) | Access control, training, data security, platform security, and resilience |
| [Detect](/docs/templates/complete/detect) | Continuous monitoring and adverse event analysis |
| [Respond](/docs/templates/complete/respond) | Incident management, analysis, reporting, and mitigation |
| [Recover](/docs/templates/complete/recover) | Recovery plan execution and recovery communication |
